Comprehensive Security Measures

End-to-End Encryption

All data is encrypted in transit with TLS 1.3 and at rest with AES-256 encryption.

Real-Time Monitoring

24/7 security monitoring with automated threat detection and incident response.

Secure Infrastructure

Hosted on enterprise-grade cloud infrastructure with redundancy and failover.

Access Controls

Role-based access control (RBAC) with multi-factor authentication (MFA).

Regular Audits

Third-party security audits and penetration testing conducted quarterly.

DDoS Protection

Advanced DDoS mitigation and rate limiting to ensure service availability.

Compliance & Certifications

We maintain the highest standards of compliance and security

SOC 2 Type II

Certified

Independently audited and certified for security, availability, and confidentiality.

GDPR Compliant

Compliant

Full compliance with EU data protection regulations and user privacy rights.

CCPA Compliant

Compliant

Adherence to California Consumer Privacy Act requirements.

HIPAA Ready

Ready

Infrastructure and processes ready for healthcare compliance requirements.

Security Best Practices

Data Encryption

TLS 1.3 for all data in transit

AES-256 encryption for data at rest

Encrypted backups with secure key management

End-to-end encryption for sensitive data

Access Management

Multi-factor authentication (MFA) required

Role-based access control (RBAC)

Session management and timeout policies

Regular access reviews and audits

Incident Response

Dedicated security operations center (SOC)

Automated threat detection and alerting

Documented incident response procedures

Regular security drills and testing

Data Protection

Automated daily backups with 30-day retention

Geographic data redundancy

Disaster recovery plan with <4hr RTO

Data sanitization for deleted accounts

Responsible Disclosure

We welcome security researchers to help us keep FlashFusion secure. If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it responsibly.

Email: security@flashfusion.co

PGP Key: Available on request

We commit to acknowledging reports within 24 hours and providing regular updates on remediation progress. Eligible vulnerabilities may qualify for our bug bounty program.

Questions About Security?

Our security team is here to answer your questions and provide detailed information
